text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Killer. The #Coronavirus has now infected 49,257 people in the United States and Donald Trump's #EpidemicOfIncompetence has contributed to the untimely deaths of 616 Americans. South Korea has only had 120 deaths. They tested. Trump blocked testing. https://t.co/vX6ijvOFlu

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
